alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 9:42AM EST until January 17 at 1:45AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River at Dublin affecting Laurens, Johnson, Wilkinson and Washington Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Oconee River at Dublin. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23 feet, minor flooding continues in the woodlands and natural flood plain along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 80. Flooding will increase on some dirt river access roads. The water level will be at least one foot deep in some sections of the roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 23.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday evening and continue falling to 8.2 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 21 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued this evening at 945 PM EST.
